title: How to Make an Origami Paper Lantern

steps.headline: Take a sheet of origami paper.
Cut to about 1–2 inches (2.5–5.1 cm) starting from the fold.
Open up and tape around the outsides.
steps.description: With the cuts going up and down.

steps.headline: Fold the cuts together.
steps.description: For instance, take one cut, and fold top and bottom together.

steps.headline: Cut a long strip out of construction paper

text: Take a sheet of origami paper.  Fold in half.  Cut to about 1–2 inches (2.5–5.1 cm) starting from the fold.  Open up and tape around the outsides. With the cuts going up and down. Fold the cuts together. For instance, take one cut, and fold top and bottom together. Cut a long strip out of construction paper  Glue or tape strip on.  Finished.
